{{Wired embedded system |brand=MikroTik |model=RouterBOARD 333 (RB333) |est_release_date=2007 |is_manuf=Yes |type=general purpose |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_poe=af |cpu1_brand=Freescale Semiconductor |cpu1_model=MPC8321;MPC8321VRADDC, 266/266/200 MHZ, QEAC0625, MSIA, 1M39D JYACQD; |fla1=64 MiB |fla1_brand=Hynix |fla1_model=HY27US08121A-TPCB |ram1=64 MiB |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5DS16M16CS-5T |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI |expansion_minipci_num=3 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Micrel |eth_chip2_model=KSZ8041NL;m KSZ, 8041NL, 0738A3U, M174710; |eth_chip3_brand=Micrel |eth_chip3_model=KSZ8041NL;m KSZ, 8041NL, 0738A3U, M174710; |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports=2 |oui_eth=00:0C:42 }} [http://routerboard.com/pdf/rb333ugBe.pdf User's Manual]
This device is using 3x '''Micrel''' KSZ8041NL 10/100 PHYs - no Switch, each interface is independent.
==Additional external links== *[http://freescalewiki.com/index.php?title=MPC8321/MPC8323 MPC8321/MPC8323 @ the '''Freescale Wiki''']
